title: Bond Girls Are Forever (2002 - USA) documentary
description:
Bond Girls Are Forever (2002 - USA)

Documentary

featuring . . . . Maryam d'Abo, Halle Berry, Ursula Andress, Honor Blackman,
                  Jill St. John, Jane Seymour, Maud Adams, Carey Lowell,
                  Michelle Yeoh, Judi Dench, Rosamund Pike
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0353252/


Through vintage film clips of past Bond movie epics, and with the participation of several former "Bond Girls" as interviewees, the documentary traces the evolution of the typical James Bond heroine from decorative damsel in distress to gutsy participant in the action. In addition to the provocatively named romantic partners enjoyed by the various movie Bonds over the past 40 years, the viewer is treated with the input of Judi Dench, the most recent actor to play 007's no-nonsense superior officer, M.


Video: XviD, 448x336, 23.976 fps, 890 Kbps, 00h46m16s
Audio: MP3, 48000 Hz, joint stereo, 155 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
